snippet.title: Real Anime Situation! DT OP Movie
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2743760?utm_source=youtubeen

I’m Shun, and I have a talent for crushing romance flags—in real life! Featuring even more eye-popping art, nuanced animations, plus a fresh-faced cast of DT-obsessed heroines, this Moe Game Awards-winning comedy franchise also received its own hit anime adaptation.

Subscribe & Follow Shiravune for our latest news:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/shiravune/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shiravune
Discord: https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy
Website: https://shiravune.com/
